resources.string: ANZ GoMoney NZ Mods
Module compatible with your version of the ANZ GoMoney App.
Module is not compatible with your version of the ANZ GoMoney App.
GoMoney Wallet should work now.
GoMoney Wallet will be disabled until this module is updated.
GoMoney Wallet will be disabled when root detection is disabled.
Help and FAQ\'s
Displays helpful information about the module, upcoming features etc.
Root Detection
Enable this to avoid root detection for the ANZ GoMoney app.
Spoof Device (Beta Feature)
Spoofs your device information (to be shown as a Samsung Galaxy Note 3) which may allow GoMoney Wallet to work.
Contact Me
Click here to find contact information to send me feedback and bugs notice or to simply follow me on social media for updates.
Donate
If you like my work, feel free to donate. :D
About
By Prashant B. (PBombNZ)
Restart Required

A restart is required for your changes to be in effect.\n\n \'If Spoof Device\' was enabled you MUST clear all cache and data of the ANZ GoMoney application and relogin. So keep your Account Number and password on hand.
In order to spoof your device you MUST clear all cache and data of the ANZ GoMoney application and re-login. So keep your Account Number and password on hand.
